testcase.name: The user is able to create an account then login successfully
testcase.system-out: Given The user has launched the automation Practise application.............passed When the user click on Sign in..............................................passed And the user create an account with the email nancy.omed@yahoo.com..........passed And the email is verified successfully......................................passed And the user clicks on create an account....................................passed And the user enters the title MR............................................passed And the user enters first name Nancy........................................passed And the user enters last name Hanna.........................................passed And the user enters password 12345..........................................passed And the user enters date of birth as 12 and 11 and 1995.....................passed And the user enters the address details as Comp1 and Fin Address............passed And the user enters city Cairo..............................................passed And the user enters state New York..........................................passed And the user enters postal code 12345.......................................passed And the user enters country United States...................................passed And the user enters mobile phone 0123233....................................passed And the user assigns an address alias for future reference Add Elias........passed And the user clicks on Register.............................................passed Then Account is Created Successfully........................................passed

testcase.name: Cart Checkout scenario
testcase.system-out: Given The user has launched the automation Practise application.............passed When the user click on Sign in..............................................passed And the user enters the configured Email Address nancy.omed@yahoo.com.......passed And the user enters the configured password 12345...........................passed And the user clicks on signIn...............................................passed And the user logged in successfully.........................................passed And the user selects Blouses Subcategory in Women Category..................passed And the user selects the Blouse product.....................................passed And the user selects White color and M size.................................passed And the user click on add to cart...........................................passed And the user proceed to first checkout......................................passed And the user proceed to second checkout.....................................passed And the user proceed to third checkout......................................passed And the user agree to the terms and conditions..............................passed And the user proceed to forth checkout......................................passed And the user selects payment option bankwire................................passed And the user confirms the order.............................................passed Then order should be confirmed..............................................passed And order is placed on order history page Blouse and White and M and quantity and total price are displayed correctly.passed
